description: 无人机起飞后，上升2米，然后前进9米，最后降落。
code:
import airsim
client = airsim.MultirotorClient()
client.confirmConnection()
client.enableApiControl(True)
client.armDisarm(True)
client.takeoffAsync().join()
client.moveByVelocityAsync(0, 0, -2, 1.0).join()
client.moveByVelocityAsync(5.0, 0, 0, 1.8).join()
client.hoverAsync().join()
time.sleep(2)
client.landAsync().join()
client.armDisarm(False)
client.enableApiControl(False)

description: 无人机起飞后，旋转向左90度，然后向后飞行18米，最后降落。
code:
import airsim
client = airsim.MultirotorClient()
client.confirmConnection()
client.enableApiControl(True)
client.armDisarm(True)
client.takeoffAsync().join()
client.rotateToYawAsync(-90).join()
client.moveByVelocityAsync(-5.0, 0, 0, 3.6).join()
client.hoverAsync().join()
time.sleep(2)
client.landAsync().join()
client.armDisarm(False)
client.enableApiControl(False)

description: 无人机起飞后，前进5米，然后悬停5秒，然后向左飞行13米，最后降落。
code:
import airsim
client = airsim.MultirotorClient()
client.confirmConnection()
client.enableApiControl(True)
client.armDisarm(True)
client.takeoffAsync().join()
client.moveByVelocityAsync(5.0, 0, 0, 1.0).join()
client.hoverAsync().join()
time.sleep(5)  # 悬停5秒
client.moveByVelocityAsync(0, -5.0, 0, 2.6).join()
client.hoverAsync().join()
time.sleep(2)
client.landAsync().join()
client.armDisarm(False)
client.enableApiControl(False)

description: 无人机起飞后，前进18米，然后转向向左45度，然后拍照，最后降落。
code:
import airsim
client = airsim.MultirotorClient()
client.confirmConnection()
client.enableApiControl(True)
client.armDisarm(True)
client.takeoffAsync().join()
client.moveByVelocityAsync(5.0, 0, 0, 3.6).join()
client.rotateToYawAsync(-45).join()
responses = client.simGetImages([airsim.ImageRequest(0, airsim.ImageType.Scene, False, False)])
# 在此处可以对获取的图像进行处理或保存
client.hoverAsync().join()
time.sleep(2)
client.landAsync().join()
client.armDisarm(False)
client.enableApiControl(False)

client.armDisarm(False)

client.moveByVelocityAsync(0, 0, 2, 1.0).join()
client.moveByVelocityAsync(0, 5.0, 0, 2.0).join()
client.hoverAsync().join()
time.sleep(2)
client.landAsync().join()
client.armDisarm(False)
client.enableApiControl(False)
